DOC.brief_summary: The study randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled trial include participation 69 woman , age 18-40 year . The aim study test nutritional strategy help minimize effect muscle damage induce exercise . The procedure perform Federal University Health Porto Alegre ( UFCSPA ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Nutritional Interventions Exercise-induced Muscle Damage
DOC.detailed_description: The exercise-induced muscle damage associate eccentric activity affect muscle structural unit micro-injury promote local inflammatory response , muscle damage delay onset muscle soreness . These event cause impact athletic performance low adherence training program . To optimize muscle recovery damage cause exercise essential ensure adequate caloric intake , required amount macronutrients micronutrient . Recent study show protein intake sleep effective strategy inhibit muscle protein degradation , stimulate muscle protein synthesis facilitate adaptive response skeletal muscle physical exercise . Furthermore , evidence use anti-inflammatory nutrient suggest diet rich omega 3 reduce inflammation inhibition pro-inflammatory mediator . Therefore , intake nutrient combine protein meal sleep control food intake improve adherence sport training . The study consist three group everyone receive individualize diet . A randomization procedure determine type intervention . The distribution group follow : group 1 ( control ) - volunteer follow individualize diet olive oil capsule maltodextrin ; group 2 - intervention omega 3 individualized diet ; group 3 - omega 3 whey protein isolate intervention individualize diet . The order procedure perform : ( 1 ) Nutritional Anthropometric assessment ; ( 2 ) Individual orientation diet distribution supplement ; ( 3 ) Baseline assessment ( peak torque , muscle pain level vastus lateralis rectus femoris echo intensity ; ( 4 ) Muscle damage induction eccentric exercise protocol ; ( 5 ) Reviews 24h , 48h , 72h , follow routine method apply baseline .
DOC.criteria: 18 40 year age BMI 18,525kg/m2 physical exercise : < 150 minute per week pregnancy/ lactation vegetarian/vegan chronic disease pulmonary neurologic disease muscle injury/knee muscle injury medication use : antiinflammatory anticoagulant fish oil derivate allergy dietary supplement use last month : whey protein , casein , albumin , glutamin , meat soy protein , creatine , branch chain amino acid , high calorie supplement , n3 supplement antioxidant
